Tapeworms.sample_symptoms: Licking or biting at the tail or anal area, Scooting the rear end along the ground, Possible intestinal blockage, Scooting the rear end along the ground, Visible worm segments in stool or stuck in fur near the anus

Thermal Burns.sample_symptoms: Reddened or discolored areas on exposed skin, Reluctance to move or bask, Pustules that may rupture, Damaged or peeling shell scutes, Localized swelling at burn site, Raw or exposed tissue beneath blisters, Fluid-filled blisters on skin or shell

Tick Fever (Ehrlichiosis).sample_symptoms: lethargy and weakness, high fever that comes and goes, swollen lymph nodes

Ticks.sample_symptoms: Visible small bumps or dark brown parasites attached to the skin, Excessive scratching or licking at tick attachment sites, Fever or loss of appetite, Red or inflamed skin around tick bites, Lethargy or weakness

Tooth Resorption.sample_symptoms: Dropping food while eating, No outward signs of pain in some cats, Difficulty chewing or eating, Avoiding the food bowl or reluctance to eat, Excessive drooling, Excessive drooling, Difficulty chewing or eating

Tooth root abscesses.sample_symptoms: Lethargy or low activity, Overgrown or misaligned front teeth, Noticeable weight loss, Watery eyes or tear overflow

Toxoplasmosis.sample_symptoms: shallow breathing, skin, signs of discomfort, Sudden behavior changes or confusion

Trichomoniasis.sample_symptoms: My bird has pale yellow or whitish-yellow lesions  in the lining of the mouth throat, crop, and esophagus., also mouth lesions, drooling.

Tumors.sample_symptoms: loss of appetite, visible lump under skin, lethargy

Upper Respiratory Infection.sample_symptoms: My cat has difficulty breathing and decreased or absent appetite.

Urethral Obstruction.sample_symptoms: My rabbit has licking the genital area, also straining, meowing in pain.

Urinary Blockage.sample_symptoms: Increased frequency of trips to the litter box, Urinating outside the litter box, Vocalization when urinating or appearing in pain, Increased frequency of trips to the litter box, Lethargy or hiding

Urinary Tract Infection.sample_symptoms: Fever, Frequent urination / increased urination attempts, Frequent urination / increased urination attempts, Loss of appetite / not eating

Uterine Cancer.sample_symptoms: lethargy and weakness, increased urination frequency, selective eating, mammary gland cysts or tumors, enlarged abdomen, blood in urine, difficulty breathing

Velvet Disease.sample_symptoms: dust-like golden or rust-colored coating on the skin and fins, Labored or rapid gill movement, Spending excessive time near the surface of the water

Vent prolapse.sample_symptoms: My turtle has hemopurulent discharge and swelling around vent.

Vitamin A Deficiency.sample_symptoms: thickened skin, difficulty seeing or blindness, reduced appetite, swollen eyelids unable to open, respiratory infections

Vitamin C Deficiency.sample_symptoms: My fish has fin erosion, also spine curvature, lethargy.

Wet Tail (Proliferative Ileitis).sample_symptoms: dehydration, watery diarrhea with foul odor, loss of appetite, wet matted fur around tail, irritability when handled, weight loss, complete exhaustion

Wet dewlap.sample_symptoms: My rabbit has odor, also wet fur under chin, skin infection.

Whipworms.sample_symptoms: Anemia / pale gums and low energy, Dehydration / dry gums and sunken eyes, Electrolyte imbalances (high potassium

[Leptospirosis].sample_symptoms: Oral ulcers and bad breath, extreme lethargy, characterized by yellowing of the eyes

pH shock.sample_symptoms: Erratic swimming, Increased mucus production on skin or fins, labored
